trans-unit.source: Indicates that the attributed type was previously defined in COM.
trans-unit.target: 指示先前在 COM 中定义的特性化类型。

trans-unit.source: You can apply this attribute to classes or interfaces, although the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) typically applies it for you when it imports a type library.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此特性应用于类或接口，尽管[Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)通常为您应用导入类型库时。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute> is a pseudo-custom attribute that indicates that a type has been defined in a previously published type library.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute> 是一个伪自定义属性，指示已在以前发布的类型库中定义了类型。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime treats these types differently when activating, exporting, coercing, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言运行时将这些类型激活时以不同的方式、 导出、 强制转换，等等。

trans-unit.source: All base COM types that are inherited by a managed object must aggregate the Free Threaded Marshaller (FTM).
trans-unit.target: 所有基 COM 类型，继承了托管对象必须聚合自由线程封送处理程序 (FTM)。

trans-unit.source: COM types that do not aggregate the FTM can't be inherited by managed objects.
trans-unit.target: 由托管对象，不聚合 FTM 的 COM 类型不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to apply the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute> to a managed interface declaration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何应用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute>到托管的接口声明。

trans-unit.source: You apply this attribute only when generating an interop assembly manually in source code, and want to simulate the metadata produced by Tlbimp.exe.
trans-unit.target: 仅当在源代码中，手动生成互操作程序集时，才应用此特性并且想要模拟由 Tlbimp.exe 生成的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute" />.
